text: Lucas Marcos Meireles (born 22 September 1995), commonly known as Lucão, is a Brazilian footballer who plays as a forward for Japanese club Kagoshima United FC. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|State League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Continental !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals |- |Arsenal-MG |2016 |colspan="3"|– |2Appearances in the Campeonato Mineiro Module II||0||0||0||colspan="2"|–||0||0||2||0 |- |Makedonija GjP |2016–17 |rowspan="2"|First Football League |11||0||colspan="2"|–||0||0||colspan="2"|–||0||0||11||0 |- |Renova |2017–18 |18||3||colspan="2"|–||1Appearances in the Macedonian Cup||0||colspan="2"|–||0||0||19||3 |- |Apollon Larissa |2018–19 |Football League |24||8||colspan="2"|–||3Appearances in the Greek Cup||3||colspan="2"|–||0||0||27||11 |- ! colspan="3" |Career total !53!!11!!2!!0!!4!!3!!0!!0!!0!!0!!59!!14 |} ;Notes ==References== ==External links== * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Brazilian expatriate footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Macedonian First Football League players Category:Football League (Greece) players Category:J2 League players Category:FK Makedonija Gjorče Petrov players Category:FK Renova players Category:SC Gjilani players Category:Apollon Larissa F.C. players Category:Kagoshima United FC players Category:Brazilian expatriate sportspeople in North Macedonia Category:Brazilian expatriate sportspeople in Greece Category:Brazilian expatriate sportspeople in Japan Category:Expatriate footballers in North Macedonia Category:Expatriate footballers in Kosovo Category:Expatriate footballers in Greece Category:Expatriate footballers in Japan
title: Lucão (footballer, born 1995)
